How to Add a New Single Member

Welcome to the New Member Registration Guide! This guide will help you register a Single Member in the system. Follow each step carefully to complete the registration successfully.

Step 1: Access the "Add New Member" Page

  • Log into the application and click on Members in the left sidebar.
  • Click on the Add a New Member button to begin.

Step 2: Choose the Member Type

Select Single Member from the dropdown list.

Step 3: Fill in Personal Details

  • Salutation
  • First Name
  • Surname
  • Date of Birth
  • Gender
  • Country of Birth
  • Marital Status

Step 4: Add Contact Details

  • District
  • Telephone Number
  • Mobile Phone Number
  • Email Address
  • Physical Address
  • Receive Statement Via (Email or Post)

Step 5: Add Next of Kin Information

  • Full Name
  • Relationship
  • Phone Number

Step 6: Statutory Details

  • Is Client Resident — Yes/No
  • Tax PIN
  • Income Range
  • Adverse Media Screening Done — Yes/No

Step 7: Employment Details (If Applicable)

If the client is employed, additional fields will appear for occupation and employer information.

Step 8: Account Details

  • Fund Name
  • Fee Category
  • Withdraw Dividends? — Yes/No
  • Agent Name

Step 9: Bank Details

You may choose to provide bank details now or later:

If Yes: Enter bank name, branch, currency, account number, and account type.
If No: You can continue, but withdrawals won't be available without bank details.

Step 10: Complete Registration

Click Finish to complete the registration. Missing or incorrect fields will be highlighted in red.

End of Single Member Registration Guide
